replies.body:
Raydere doesn't belong in this region I think the longer he stays here the worst he is actually going to compete in the future. Don't get me wrong Raydere is a great player but OCE is 1 of the lowest... um rated I guess.. Regions within the entire League of Legends game, If he really wants to become the greatest he should go to a more challenging Region.

P.S. I'm not trying to be racist here, but I'm just saying that he will be more better in a more challenging Region.
Feels good when you vote for the best player in OCE, Ryoo!
The voting system is actually really broken, I hope it's fixed for next time.

Because all the best players in their respective roles, as adjudicated by the vote, don't get to play.

Although just for the record, my ideal team is: Raydere, Egym, ChuzChuz, Carbon & Swip3r
